assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_InvestmentRisk
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Assume that you have an initial investment portfolio worth $10,000. If your portfolio drops to $7,000, what do you do?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Sell all investments so that you protect downside risk. Sell a portion of investments to cut your losses and rebalance to move secure investment assets. Continue holding the investment. Invest more capital.
